page.title: 11Transport cont
page.content: The coach company also provides transport for local school children travelling out of the area to the nearest comprehensive school at Tregony,about ten miles away. {Taxi Services.} The only other speedy means of transport around the area is by taxi. Comparing the size of population with the number of taxi services,this seems to be the only area of transport that is thriving. There are four taxi services operating in the area.One of these operates from the Gerrans district and the other three from St.Mawes.Of the three St.Mawes taxi services,one has only recently begun operating.Besides the transporting of the general public, some of the taxi services are under contract to take children to the local primary schools from outlying areas.
